description: This file defines theming and UI styling utilities for a Flutter application, including color schemes, text styles, and common decoration helpers.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Provides static color constants and gradient definitions used app-wide.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Builds the overall ThemeData for the app, including color scheme, text theme, and component styles, and provides decoration helper methods.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the Flutter ThemeData object configured with app-wide color schemes, text styles, and component themes.

methods.name: headerDecoration
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with gradient, border radius, and shadow, used for headers.

methods.name: surfaceCardDecoration
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with gradient, border radius, shadow, and border, used for surface cards.
